oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Tierno Jimenez, Carlos
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In the area of computer vision, the one-shot object recognition is a subfield that aims to solve the problem of detecting one or more objects in an image. In this project, a MultiAttention network model able to perform one-shot object recognition will be developed. As a result, given an object recognition dataset the model will be able to recognize n different classes C that the model has never seen before, with just one sample of it.
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Universidad de Zaragoza; Departamento de Informática e Ingeniería de Sistemas; Área de Lenguajes y Sistemas Informáticos
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Graduado en Ingeniería Informática
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Multi-Attention Network for One-Shot Object Recognition
Multi-Attention Network for One-Shot Object Recognition
